articles.title: 12 milionów osób musiało opuścić domy. W tym kraju jest najgorzej trzeci rok z rzędu
articles.summary: Sudan już trzeci rok z rzędu zajmuje pierwsze miejsce na liście Międzynarodowego Komitetu Ratunkowego (IRC), obejmującej kraje najbardziej dotknięte kryzysami humanitarnymi. W zestawieniu na 2023 r. znalazło się 20 państw, w których sytuacja humanitarna może się pogorszyć w najbliższym czasie. Konflikt w Sudanie pochłonął już dziesiątki tysięcy ofiar. Na liście IRC znajduje się też Ukraina.

articles.summary: The drugmaker is betting big on retatrutide as the next pillar of its obesity portfolio after its weight loss injection Zepbound and its upcoming pill.

articles.title: AI tools could drive $263 billion in holiday sales. Walmart and Target are racing to get in
articles.summary: Consumers are turning to AI chatbots like ChatGPT for gift discovery, reviews and price matching, potentially driving billions in sales this holiday season.

articles.title: From puppies to superheroes, Chinese AI toys are bringing hugs — and hesitation
articles.summary: China's AI toy industry is growing as Beijing pushes companies and consumers to integrate the technology.

articles.title: 'Stranger Things' ushered in a new era for Netflix
articles.summary: A lot has changed since its first season in 2016, as Netflix has announced dozens of "Stranger Things" partnerships and collaborations with brands.

articles.title: Rivian's AI, autonomy impress Wall Street, but EV and capital concerns remain
articles.summary: Rivian impressed Wall Street with its plans for AI and automation, but significant challenges involving demand and capital remain for the EV maker.

articles.title: Disney's 'Zootopia 2' to hit $1 billion box office, only the second Hollywood film to do so this year
articles.summary: Disney Animation's "Zootopia 2" is set to cross the billion-dollar box-office mark on Friday, becoming the second Hollywood film to reach the benchmark in 2025.

articles.title: Homeowners are losing thousands in equity thanks to weakening prices
articles.summary: Weaker prices mean homeowners are starting to lose equity after several years of huge gains.

articles.title: ‘The next protein’: Fiber is shaping up to be the latest grocery obsession
articles.summary: As consumers find their next grocery obsession in fiber, food and beverage companies are racing to keep up with the trend.

articles.title: Lululemon CEO Calvin McDonald to depart in January as retailer struggles to compete, woo shoppers
articles.summary: Lululemon's CEO Calvin McDonald will leave the athleisure retailer at the end of January as sales in its largest market sag and consumers flee to competitors.
